scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend

*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,md,json}: bash -lc 'if git ls-files --error-unmatch backend >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm run -w backend lint --silent -- --fix || true; fi'
bash -lc 'if git ls-files --error-unmatch frontend >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm run -w frontend lint --silent -- --fix || true; fi'
